title: Banned for playing well?!?!?!?
body:
Literally Riot is fucking retarded.

Played a game on my silver account where I got completely camped and shit talked by the enemy laner every time I got tower dove. I muted him because of harassment, I ended up winning the game while going negative, I reported him for verbal abuse, and next time I sign into my account I see that I'm suspended. I reviewed that "hateful terms" I said and all I see is me typing "GG". This tribunal is a bunch of bullshit, love getting banned just because the enemy team gets demolished.

THANKS RIOT! KEEP UP THE GREAT WORK!

replies.body: Go ahead and post your chat logs. After looking at them myself, I'd say you're lucky you didn't get perma-banned.
you have to unban him so that he can post them lol

You can post on the forums even if your account is banned in-game. He also said "my silver account", but this one is Gold. Not sure if Tantram found the smurf or the guy is also super toxic on his main lol.
yea but he got a board-bann aswell after calling me f.. 10min ago lol
Was going to mention that but he still has the smurf. Probably.
guess both are banned lol
Teamwork OP
{{champion:81}} /
\\ {{champion:44}}
damn on point man :D
That's not an arm btw
http://puu.sh/mWfIy/62cb66a58b.jpg

OH SH**!!!!

He didn't even need to actually smite the OP to smite him!
"It is in days like these, that kids like you should be smited to hell"

>
> Go ahead and post your chat logs. After looking at them myself, I'd say you're lucky you didn't get perma-banned.

Thou hast been smitten!

> Go ahead and post your chat logs. After looking at them myself, I'd say you're lucky you didn't get perma-banned.

Tantram, I love your posts on this board. So. Much.

"Riot doesn't look into every ban case"

I have proof right here that we have a bonafide badass beating bad baddies into banishment.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Tantram,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=9lOc8i38,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-02-05T01:57:48.854+0000)

{{summoner:11}} 'd
HAHHAHAAA XD I <3 your name XD fits perfectly with this post {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

show chatlog or dont tell lies. 
also calling riot fucking retarded doesnt really add to the fact that you are such an innocent person like you say. to me (and i guess everyone else) you look kinda mad and salty and toxic.

edit: dont answer him guys, he is banned lol. he called me fucking %%% and now he is banned rofl that was fast gj mods!

yup you totally look like an innocent person.
i bet you never flame rofl.

i dont even need your chatlogs to see the bann is deserved. hope the perma bann hits you soon.

also why you insult me? if you dont want ppl to post on your thread... DONT MAKE A THREAD!

idk man sounds like you kinda deserved it, you're not exactly mr super nice guy here. if you don't post the chat logs, you just look like another whiny troll who got banned and wants to cuss out riot for not letting you be a jerk

>Literally Riot is fucking retarded.

I get the feeling you weren't banned for "playing well."
Do you have chat logs to share, or do you expect the boards to take your word on good faith?

> Literally Riot is fucking retarded.


isnt that enough proof that he is a good guy? LOL
These people are going to grow up to be the worst criminals ever.
Nono, the worst criminals are those who don't talk in champ select, and then take a champ 1 second before the game starts and expect you to adapt the team around him

theres no need for that all he said was gg
Damn it! Now I REALLY wanna see the chat logs out of pure curiosity :< !
